AT.name: Bombing Bastards
AT.description: Ein Bombenspaß! Jage Unmengen von Viechern in 30 fiesen Irrgärten in die Luft! Besiege teuflische Bosse in heroischen Kämpfen! Spiele solo oder mit bis zu 5 anderen Spielern in erbarmungslosen Schlachten! Tritt in diesem explosiven Arcade-Game eine urkomische Reise mit dem cleveren Dr. Wallow an und erobere die Galaxie! Merkmale: - 5 hübsche Welten mit 30 fiesen Irrgärten. - Unmengen von bösen Viechern. - Viele Gegenstände und Power-ups zum Sammeln. - 5 teuflische Boss-Level, die dich vor eine richtige Herausforderung stellen werden! - Ein urkomisches Solo-Abenteuer, bei dem du dem cleveren Dr. Wallow hilfst, die ganzen Viecher zu beseitigen und die Galaxie zu übernehmen. - Ein komplett anpassbarer Schlachtmodus für 2–5 Spieler mit GamePad, Wii-Fernbedienung, Pro Controller und/oder Classic Controller Pro. - Über 10 Minuten beißender Kommentare von Dr. Wallow; gesprochen von David Goldfarb. - 7 berühmte klassische Musikstücke, elektronisch verhunzt von Samuel Safa.

BG.name: Bombing Bastards
BG.description: Have a blast! Bomb oodles of nasty critters in a series of 30 wicked mazes! Defeat hellish bosses in heroic fights! Play solo, or up to 5 players in merciless battles! Embark on a hilarious journey with the witty Dr. Wallow to conquer the galaxy in this explosively fun arcade game! Key features: - 5 picturesque worlds with 30 wicked mazes. - A huge bestiary of critters to blast. - A multitude of items and power ups to collect. - 5 hellish boss levels whose punishing difficulty will only be matched by the satisfaction you’ll get once you beat them. - A hilarious single-player adventure where you help the witty Dr. Wallow get rid of all the critters and become the ruler of the galaxy. - A fully customizable battle mode for 2 to 5 players using the Gamepad, Wii Remotes, Pro Controllers and/or Classic Controllers. - Over 10 minutes of caustic comments from Dr. Wallow, voiced by David Goldfarb. - 7 famous pieces of classical music electronically butchered by Samuel Safa.

BE.name: Bombing Bastards
BE.description: Bombardez une flopée de créatures maléfiques dans une série de 30 labyrinthes ensorcelés ! Menez des combats héroïques contre des boss infernaux ! Jouez seul ou jusqu’à 5 joueurs dans des batailles sans merci ! Partez à la conquête de la galaxie avec le terrible Dr. Wallow dans ce jeu d’arcade explosif ! Caractéristiques : - 5 mondes pittoresques avec 30 labyrinthes ensorcelés. - Un large bestiaire de créatures à bombarder. - Une multitude d’objets et de power-ups à collecter. - 5 niveaux de boss infernaux. - Une aventure hilarante en mode 1 joueur, où vous aidez le terrible Dr. Wallow à éliminer toutes les créatures pour devenir le maître de la galaxie. - Un mode bataille entièrement personnalisable pour 2 à 5 joueurs utilisant le Gamepad, les Télécommandes Wii, les manettes classiques et les manettes pro. - Plus de 10 minutes de commentaires caustiques du Dr Wallow avec la voix de David Goldfarb. - 7 musiques classiques célèbres massacrées électroniquement par Samuel Safa.

ES.name: Bombing Bastards
ES.description: ¡Este juego es la bomba! Explota hordas de criaturas maléficas en treinta laberintos de locura. Libra batallas heroicas contra enemigos finales infernales. Juega solo o con cuatro amigos más en combates sin piedad. Embárcate a la conquista de la galaxia junto al malvado Dr. Wallow en un juego arcade sencillamente explosivo. Características: - 5 mundos pintorescos con 30 laberintos de locura. - Un impresionante bestiario de criaturas para explotar. - Montones de objetos y potenciadores por conseguir. - 5 infernales enemigos finales de nivel. - Una desternillante aventura para un jugador en la que ayudarás al terrible Dr. Wallow a librarse de todas las criaturas para alzarse como amo y señor de la galaxia. - Un modo batalla modificable para 2-5 jugadores mediante GamePad, mandos de Wii, mandos Pro de Wii U o mandos clásico Pro. - Más de 10 minutos de comentarios cáusticos del Dr. Wallow. - 7 famosos temas de música clásica masacrados electrónicamente.

IT.name: Bombing Bastards
IT.description: Un divertimento esplosivo! Bombarda un sacco di disgustose creature in una serie di 30 perfidi labirinti! Sconfiggi terribili boss in eroiche battaglie! Gioca da solo, o con altri 5 giocatori in battaglie spietate! Imbarcati in un divertentissimo viaggio con l’acuto Dr. Wallow alla conquista della galassia in questo esplosivo gioco arcade! Caratteristiche: - 5 mondi pittoreschi con 30 perfidi labirinti. - Un vasto assortimento di creature da far saltare in aria. - Una moltitudine di potenziamenti da collezionare. - 5 terribili livelli boss. - Una divertentissima avventura single-player dove aiuterai il Dr. Wallow a sbarazzarsi di tutte le creature e a diventare il sovrano della galassia. - Una modalità battaglia interamente personalizzabile per 2-5 giocatori, usando il GamePad, telecomandi Wii, Pro Controller Pro e/o controller tradizionale pro. - Più di 10 minuti di caustici commenti dal Dr. Wallow. - 7 famosi brani di musica classica massacrati elettronicamente.

LT.description: Have a blast! Bomb oodles of nasty critters in a series of 30 wicked mazes! Defeat hellish bosses in heroic fights! Play solo, or up to 5 players in merciless battles! NL.name: Bombing Bastards
NL.description: Bommen los! Blaas in 30 wrede doolhoven monsters op! Versla in heldhaftige gevechten duivelse levelbazen! Speel in genadeloze gevechten solo of tegen maximaal 5 spelers! Ga in dit explosief leuke spel op een hilarische reis met de grappige Dr. Wallow om het universum te veroveren! Kenmerken: - 5 fraaie werelden met 30 tergende doolhoven. - Legio verschillende monsters om op te blazen. - Heel veel voorwerpen en power-ups om te verzamelen. - 5 duivelse eindbaaslevels die zo moeilijk zijn dat je blij bent als je ze uitgespeeld krijgt. - Een hilarisch avontuur voor 1 speler. Help de grappige Dr. Wallow met het opruimen van de monsters en word de baas over het universum. - Een compleet aanpasbare gevechtsmodus voor 2-5 spelers, te spelen met GamePad, Wii-afstandsbedieningen, Pro-controllers en/of Traditionele Controllers Pro. - Meer dan 10 minuten sarcastisch commentaar van Dr. Wallow. - 7 beroemde stukken klassieke muziek, vakkundig elektronisch verziekt.

PL.name: Bombing Bastards
PL.description: Have a blast! Bomb oodles of nasty critters in a series of 30 wicked mazes! Defeat hellish bosses in heroic fights! Play solo, or up to 5 players in merciless battles! Embark on a hilarious journey with the witty Dr. Wallow to conquer the galaxy in this explosively fun arcade game! Key features: - 5 picturesque worlds with 30 wicked mazes. - A huge bestiary of critters to blast. - A multitude of items and power ups to collect. - 5 hellish boss levels whose punishing difficulty will only be matched by the satisfaction you’ll get once you beat them. - A hilarious single-player adventure where you help the witty Dr. Wallow get rid of all the critters and become the ruler of the galaxy. - A fully customizable battle mode for 2 to 5 players using the Gamepad, Wii Remotes, Pro Controllers and/or Classic Controllers. - Over 10 minutes of caustic comments from Dr. Wallow, voiced by David Goldfarb. - 7 famous pieces of classical music electronically butchered by Samuel Safa.

PT.name: Bombing Bastards
PT.description: Uma explosão de diversão! Exploda várias criaturas nojentas em 30 labirintos insanos! Derrote chefões infernais em batalhas heroicas! Jogue individualmente ou com até cinco jogadores em batalhas cruéis! Embarque em uma jornada hilária com o sarcástico Dr. Wallow neste jogo arcade que é uma explosão de diversão! Características: - 5 mundos pitorescos com 30 labirintos insanos. - Um enorme bestiário de criaturas para explodir. - Inúmeros itens e impulsos. - 5 níveis com chefões infernais tão difíceis quanto divertidos de derrotar. - Uma aventura hilária na qual você ajudará o sarcástico Dr. Wallow a se livrar de todas as criaturas e se tornar o soberano da galáxia. - Um modo de batalha que pode ser totalmente personalizado para 2 a 5 jogadores usando o GamePad, Comando Wii, Comando Wii U Pro e/ou Comando Clássico Pro. - Mais de 10 minutos de comentários cáusticos do Dr. Wallow. - 7 famosas composições de música clássica massacradas eletronicamente.

RU.name: Bombing Bastards
RU.description: Приготовься бомбить не по-детски! Взрывай монстров пачками в 30 лабиринтах! Побеждай адских боссов в героических битвах! Играй один или пригласи до 4 друзей! Отправляйся в свой собственный крестовый поход вместе с остроумным Доктором Валлоу и завоюй Галактику в этой убойной аркаде! Особенности: - 30 запутанных лабиринтов в 5 красочных мирах. - Монстры на любой вкус и цвет. - Куча предметов и улучшений. - 5 отчаянных сражений с адскими боссами, сложность которых можно сравнить разве что с удовлетворением от победы над ними. - Полная взрывного юмора однопользовательская компания, в ходе которой ты поможешь Доктору Валлоу разгромить врагов и стать правителем Галактики. - Настраиваемый боевой режим, от двух до 5 игроков, с GamePad, Wii Remote и прочими контроллерами. - Более 10 минут язвительных комментариев Доктора Валлоу в исполнении Дэвида Голдфарба. - 7 шедевров мировой классической музыки в безжалостной и беспощадной электронной обработке Сэмюэля Сафа.

SE.name: Bombing Bastards
SE.description: Have a blast! Bomb oodles of nasty critters in a series of 30 wicked mazes! Defeat hellish bosses in heroic fights! Play solo, or up to 5 players in merciless battles! Embark on a hilarious journey with the witty Dr. Wallow to conquer the galaxy in this explosively fun arcade game! Key features: - 5 picturesque worlds with 30 wicked mazes. - A huge bestiary of critters to blast. - A multitude of items and power ups to collect. - 5 hellish boss levels whose punishing difficulty will only be matched by the satisfaction you’ll get once you beat them. - A hilarious single-player adventure where you help the witty Dr. Wallow get rid of all the critters and become the ruler of the galaxy. - A fully customizable battle mode for 2 to 5 players using the Gamepad, Wii Remotes, Pro Controllers and/or Classic Controllers. - Over 10 minutes of caustic comments from Dr. Wallow, voiced by David Goldfarb. - 7 famous pieces of classical music electronically butchered by Samuel Safa.
